title: Promifun Gel Bunion Protector Shield, 10 Pack of Bunion Pads and Cushions, Bunion Guard for Big Toe, Relieve Foot Pain from Friction, Rubbing and Pressure
features: 【Protect and Cushion】Bunion pad works to cushion the side of your foot and keeps your foot from friction, rubbing and pressure. The bunion shield covers your bunions, protects and cushions them a whole day.
【Soft Material】 Bunion pad is made of flexible and durable gel, which is odorless and no irritate to your skin. They are also reusable and washable.

【Easy to use】Slip one over your big toe, the gel separators fits comfortably between the big toe and the second one. Bunion guards will not slip off when you wear on big toes. Wear Socks to Keep it Better in Place.

【Fits most people】Bunion cushion fits for men and women, who is suffering from the bunion pain. Slim design allows it to wear with most socks and footwear. Super soft and comfortable gel makes you almost do not feel it in shoes. One size fits most.

【What you get】The package comes with 10 pieces of bunion cushions. Promifun is especially concerned about the quality of the products and customer experience, so if you have any questions, you can feel free to contact us. We guarantee 100% money free back for quality problem item.
description: Product Description Promifun is a manufacturer of health protection products, which is devoted to help you alleviate various problems of your feet and hands. Such as overlapping toes, hammer toes, bunions, blister, carcked heels and trrigger finger,etc. We use high-quality raw materials, and each products is tested to ensure effectivesness and safety. We focus on product improvement to provide better items for each customer, which based on every feedback of buyer. More attention to foot and hand health, choose your foot and hand care products from Promifun. Promifun - Foot and Hand Care Expert. Cushions and Protects Promifun’ goal is for all bunion sufferers to walk comfortably. Bunion protector helps you relieve bunion pain by gently protecting the foot from shoe pressure. Why would you suffer from bunions? Bunions are mainly caused by bending of the bones. It has many symptoms. The most obvious symptoms are swelling, redness, and unusual pains in the big toe. After the occurrence of the bigfoot, due to the first metatarsal head inward migration of the protrusion, the protrusion is often squeezed and rubbed by shoes. Over time, local skin, subcutaneous tissue and joint capsule thickening, near the joint bone hyperplasia, the formation of bone redundancy, can be secondary to bunions. Easy to use Slip one over your big toe, the gel separators fits comfortably between the big toe and the second one. Bunion guards will not slip off when you wear on big toes. Wear Socks to Keep it Better in Place. Super Soft Material Bunion pad is made of flexible and durable gel, which is odorless and no irritate to your skin. They are also reusable and washable. After washing and drying in warm water, sprinkle with talcum powder or baby powder. Wipe off the excess talcum powder or baby powder before wearing. Use talcum powder and baby powder to prevent the silicone sticking together, which is inconvenient to wear. Promifun Bunion Guards Features Bunion pads are sock or shoe inserts designed to ease the pain caused by a bunion rubbing against a shoe. They cushion calluses and hard skin created by a bunion.
